name: TIME'S ART #3: ESPERA
description: "You don't know what awaits you" / "Yes I do". From 2015-2019 I created handmade stickers like this one and pasted them up in places I'd see on my daily commute. They were reminders I needed. For most of them, the passage of time meant their destruction or removal. But, for a few others, Time became another artistic element involved, giving them an even more unique aspect. This one even got a reply!
